data.why:
I want to contribute two modules:

    DBIx::CodeKit - Universal database code table. DBIx::BabelKit -
    Multilingual universal code table.

    These replace many database code tables with a single physical code
    table which holds all of the required code sets. This eliminates
    lots of schema complexity, application programming and associated
    bugs. My web site has more info and running demos:

    http://www.webbysoft.com/babelkit
